sqlMap.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, LIFECYCLCLSNAME, LODINSEQ, LIFECYCLUSEDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR05, (SELECT @NO := 0) R ORDER BY LODINSEQ, LIFECYCLCLSNAME ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIFR05 ( LifeCyclClsName, LodinSeq, LifeCyclUseDstcd ) VALUES ( #lifeCyclClsName#, #lodinSeq#, #lifeCyclUseDstcd# )
